title: Bug 2529 - [Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529 - [Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S). Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting project P2 and attempting to close it, the 'Close project' option is unavailable in the UI.
EB: The 'Close project' option should always be available in the UI when a project is selected, regardless of the project's state.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2. 
2. Select P2. 
3. Attempt to close P2 and observe that the 'Close project' option is unavailable in the UI.
